Robert Redford's first wife, Lola Van Wagenen, was born on December 21, 1938. She is an accomplished environmental activist and a prominent figure in her own right. After 27 years of marriage, Robert Redford and Lola Van Wagenen decided to part ways in 1985. The decision was not made lightly, as both individuals had invested significant time and energy into their relationship. The couple cited the challenges of maintaining a marriage in the public eye and their diverging paths as contributing factors to their split.
